sentences: Everett Morton (5 April 1950 â€“ 8 October 2021) was a Kittitian-born British drummer and percussionist from Birmingham, England, most notable as the drummer for the early 1980s ska band The Beat.
Morton reunited with Ranking Roger and they performed as The Beat in the UK, until Ranking Roger's death, in 2019.
Morton died on 8 October 2021, at the age of 71.
